mapper.insert:
select @@IDENTITY as id
insert into gm_goods_model ( STORE_ID , CATEGORY_ID , MODEL_NAME , MODEL_ATTRIBUTE_F_NAME , MODEL_ATTRIBUTE_S_NAME , MODEL_DESCRIPTION , CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_TIME )
values (#{storeId} , #{categoryId} , #{modelName}, #{modelAttributeFName} , #{modelAttributeSName} , #{modelDescription}, now() , now() )
insert into gm_model_images ( MODEL_ID , MODEL_IMAGE , CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_TIME ) values (#{modelId}, #{modelImage} , now() , now() )
mapper.select:
select i.ID id , i.MODEL_ID modelId , i.MODEL_IMAGE modelImage , i.CREATE_TIME createTime , i.UPDATE_TIME updateTime , i.REMOVE_TIME removeTime from gm_model_images i
and i.MODEL_ID = #{id}
and i.IMAGE_ENABLE = 1
order by i.CREATE_TIME asc

select m.ID id, m.STORE_ID storeId , m.CATEGORY_ID categoryId , m.MODEL_NAME modelName , m.MODEL_ATTRIBUTE_F_NAME modelAttributeFName , m.MODEL_ATTRIBUTE_S_NAME modelAttributeSName , m.MODEL_DESCRIPTION modelDescription , m.MODEL_IS_DISCOUNT modelIsDiscount , m.COMMENT_COUNT commentCount , m.DEAL_COUNT dealCount , m.COLLECTION_COUNT collectionCount , m.CREATE_TIME createTime , m.UPDATE_TIME updateTime , m.REMOVE_TIME removeTime from gm_goods_model m
and m.STORE_ID = #{id}
and m.MODEL_ENABLE = 1
order by m.CREATE_TIME asc
